thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to list the files in the current directory to get a better understanding of what resources are available.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the current directory will allow me to see what files are available for me to work with and will help me plan my next steps.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory.
thoughts.criticism: I could potentially be overwhelmed by the number of files in the directory, so I need to be prepared to filter the list to focus on the most relevant files.
